experience: You and Carrie both know Dimitri Ponomareff, Gelie Akhenblit, and 116 others

I offer my employees 1 day a week where they can work at home.  It's a nice change.  They pick their hours.  Most choose night hours.  Allowing employees to work at home is a sign of trust.   Agree?  Disagree?
You know you are blessed with wonderful students when class ends at 950 and you are shooing them home at 1015.

Tonight we learned how to help lead when our organization has lost its way;  how to lead through change for results and so much more.  Our final lesson for the term was how to lead, live, and love with an understanding that EVERYTHING in our lives is on loan to us. We own nothing. I'm so grateful for all these phenomenal people taught us this past 8 weeks. Pics as proof to follow!
I came across this amazing video of a noble soul who made a huge difference in people's lives without expecting anything in return.
Kindness in words creates confidence, in thoughts creates profoundness and in giving creates love.
This man proved that love and kindness are never wasted. As William Wordsmith stated " The best portion of a mans life are his little ,nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love".

Thank you Dr. Kevin Barksdale for inspiring us with your story of overcoming life's most difficult moments and personal success story. It was an honor to have been in your leadership class these past 8 weeks. #MBA #UHD #Gogators!
“Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.” ― Albert Einstein
recommendations: Lead Shop Assistant & Facebook Administrator at Custom Creatures Inc (DBA Custom Creatures Pet Shop)
January 30, 2014, Jacqueline reported directly to Carrie

Carrie, is a detail oriented, forward thinking, all around positive manager who thinks out of the box while holding the highest standards to company policy and procedures.  Carrie's ability to listen, learn, and communicate from the lowest level of employment to the highest executive levels make her a cut above the rest.  She is a motivator and a leader that not only excels but surpasses the boundaries and expectations of the typical manager position.

summary: A self-directed, seasoned professional with over 20 years in sales and customer service, eight years entrepreneurship and leadership, and 10 years in inbound/outbound sales/management. Five years of expertise in quality assurance and management coaching. Demonstrated leadership abilities and a track record of achievement pertaining increased sales, improved customer service, training and development, prospecting, retention, quality assurance and compliance. Proficient in Microsoft Word and Excel, as well as CRM programs.Experience with public speaking, social media, intrapersonal and interpersonal communication skills, resolution management, critical thinking, and problem solving. Fast-paced environment enthusiast, and gifted with multitasking abilities. Outgoing, energetic, and enthusiastic about working with a culturally diverse customer base.Jacqueline Gibson on Jan 29, 11:35 PM================Dear Carrie,I've written this recommendation of your work to share with other LinkedIn users.Details of the Recommendation:  "Carrie, is a detail oriented, forward thinking, all around positive manager who thinks out of the box while holding the highest standards to company policy and procedures.
